name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: A dedicated Printer and MFP Engineer with strong communication and problem-solving skills, bringing over 9 years of experience in desktop and laptop repair, including board level repair and desk side support. Proficient in Windows support and network troubleshooting, ensuring efficient and reliable service delivery. Proven track record in collaborating with teams and managing vendor certifications for optimal performance. Previously, as a .NET Full Stack Developer, demonstrated expertise in full application lifecycle management, including experience with **microservices architecture**, **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, and **.NET/C#** technologies, driving successful development projects and complex application implementations.

experience.responsibilities:
Provided **desk side support** for printer and Multi-Function Printer (MFP) repair, ensuring minimal downtime for clients through efficient troubleshooting processes.
Utilized **problem-solving skills** to diagnose and resolve complex issues related to desktop and laptop repairs, achieving a resolution rate of over **90%** on first attempt.
Conducted **network troubleshooting** to ensure uninterrupted connectivity and functionality of printing solutions, resulting in enhanced user satisfaction ratings by **30%**.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge on **vendor certifications** for various printer brands to enhance repair effectiveness and service quality.
Communicated effectively with clients to gather requirements and provide clear updates on repair status, leading to improved customer relationships and feedback.
Streamlined repair processes through the development of documentation and checklists, reducing average repair time by **25%**.
Implemented **Windows support** techniques to optimize OS performance on client machines, enhancing overall system efficiency.
Demonstrated expertise in **board level repair**, allowing complex hardware issues to be resolved rapidly with minimal parts replacement.
Conducted regular training sessions on **printer repair** best practices, improving team proficiency in MFP and desktop repair techniques.

Provided desk-side support for printer and MFP repair, delivering solutions that reduced downtime by **30%**.
Executed board-level repairs on printer and multifunction printers (MFP), leveraging technical expertise to resolve complex hardware issues effectively.
Conducted Windows support and desktop repair, achieving a **95%** customer satisfaction rate through effective communication and problem-solving skills.
Performed detailed network troubleshooting to ensure seamless operation of printing and MFP systems, improving network performance by **20%**.
Managed vendor certifications and maintained compliance with industry standards to enhance service delivery.
Developed training materials and conducted workshops on printer maintenance, increasing team knowledge and service capabilities.
Provided technical guidance and mentorship to junior technicians, fostering a collaborative environment that improved problem-solving efficiency.
Collaborated with clients to understand printing needs and tailored solutions to ensure optimal performance of devices, resulting in a **25%** increase in client retention.
Implemented a tracking system for service requests that streamlined operational workflows, reducing response times by **15%**.

Provided desk side support and maintenance for printers and Multifunction Printers (MFP), ensuring optimal performance and reducing downtime by **15%**.
Executed printer repair and MFP repair tasks, leveraging industry-standard techniques to resolve issues efficiently and maintain functionality.
Conducted thorough diagnostic assessments that utilized **Windows support** practices, resulting in a **30%** improvement in first-time fix rates.
Delivered outstanding customer service through excellent communication skills, facilitating client education on troubleshooting basic network issues related to printers and MFPs.
Collaborated with vendors to obtain necessary certifications for repairing various printer models, enhancing service reliability and compliance.
Applied problem-solving skills to identify and rectify common issues related to desktop and laptop repair, achieving a **25%** reduction in repair turnaround time.
Engaged in network troubleshooting to address connectivity problems affecting printer operations, significantly improving overall workflow.
Maintained meticulous documentation of repair processes and service reports, enhancing team knowledge transfer and operational efficiency.
Participated in regular training sessions to stay up-to-date with evolving printer technologies and repair strategies, including **board level repair** practices.
